Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Nanami', 3: 'We got to see so many amazing performances and play all these fun games today!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "I've known it all along—the activities you plan are always the most fun, Commandant!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "Mh-hm—Oh? What's this machine? Too many people were lining up for it, I didn't notice it earlier.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: 'Photo booth... Oh! So this is one of those vintage photo machines!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nanami', 3: "—Whoa! The countdown's starting, Commandant, hurry, get in here!", 4: '1'}
